# 二分

## 二分 
1. 小于等于目标得最后一个
```cpp
while(l < r){
    int mid = l + r +1 >>1;
    if(a[mid] <= target) l = mid;
    else r = mid - 1;
}

int res = l >=0 ?a[l] : -1;
```
2. 小于目标得最后一个
```cpp
while(l<r){
    int mid = l + r >>1;
    if(a[mid] < target)l = mid;
    else r = mid - 1;
}
int res = l >=0 ?a[l] : -1;
```
3. 大于等于目标最后一个
```cpp
while(l < r){
    int mid = l + r >> 1;
    if(a[mid] < target)l = mid + 1;
    else r = mid;
}
```

4. 大于目标第一个
```cpp
while(l< r){
    int mid = l + r >> 1;
    if(a[mid] <= target) l = mid + 1;
    else r = mid;
}

```



1. 寻找峰值 162

* 思路：根据斜率，mid < mid +1; l = mid + 1;else r = mid;

2. 旋转数组寻找最小值剑指offer11：

* 思路：二分，以右端点为标杆，大于右端点就l = mid + 1， 小于右端点 r = mid 等于右端点就需要去重r--；

```cpp

class Solution {
public:
    int findMin(vector<int>& nums) {
        int l = 0, r = nums.size()-1;
        while(l<r){
            int mid = l + r >>1;
            if(nums[mid]>nums[r])l = mid +1;
            else if(nums[mid]<nums[r]) r = mid;
            else r--;
        }
        return nums[r];
    }
};

```
